callableDetails¶

utils.callableDetails(item)[source]¶

Takes a callable item and extracts the details.

Currently only extracts things stored in item.Name and item.Params

Parameters

item (callable item) –

Returns

details – Contains the properties of the

Return type

tuple pair with string and dictionary of strings

Examples

>>> from utils import callableDetails
>>> def foo(): print("foo")
>>> foo.Name = "boo"
>>> callableDetails(foo)
('boo', None)
>>> foo.Params = {1: 2, 2: 3}
>>> callableDetails(foo)
('boo', {'1': '2', '2': '3'})
